vsParam: I don't think she'll be here...

Ah, the girl over there looks like Radiata so much...
Is she Lycoris!?

"Ah, sis!" You do have the nerve to say that!
You know how much I worried about you!?

And I was attacked by monsters.
It took me so long to get rid of them!

Get rid of the monsters? I think the monsters here are
very tough! Radiata, maybe you're very powerful?

Of course!
We've been protecting the flower!

Even that old guy said we're very powerful
although we do look like little girls!
By the way, sis, who are these people?

They saved our flower.
It might have perished without the nutrient they made.

What? Is that so?
Is that flower all right now? Great!

Yeah, it's fine now!
So, let's go back home, OK?

Mmm... No!
I still want to have fun in this world!

What? What are you talking about?! We've caused
so much trouble to them, so we'd better leave now!

But sis, look at this!
I picked this up right after I came here.

What's wrong with this piece of paper?
Let me see... "Christmas"?

Yeah! It's said you'll get what you want if you
make a wish on "Christmas"! Isn't it awesome?
I want so many things, so I'm going to enjoy "Christmas"!

Oh, Lycoris. I hate to spoil your fun,
but Christmas is over...

That piece of paper... should be a flyer of
the Christmas event held in Ruhuna...

What? No... No way!?
When will you hold next Christmas event?

Are... Are you going to look for her again...
Haha, it's no easy job to be a big sister...
